alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued June 23 at 1:59PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY... WHAT...Surf heights of 12 to 15 feet will impact WHERE...South and east facing shores of all islands WHEN...Through Saturday Impacts: MINOR...Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Precautionary/Prepardness Actions: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officals and exercise caution. && Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 149 AOAULI ASO FARAILE IUNI 23 2023 ...O LOO FAAAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA E OO I LE ASO TOONA`I... MAFUAAGA...O galu maualuluga e 12 i le 15 futu o le a aafia ai gataifale NOFOAGA...i saute ma sasa`e o le atunu`u TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Toona`i LAITI...O le a iai taimi e fafati maualuluga ai galu i le matafaga ma le aau, e aave foi le sami e faafaigatama lamatia ai fuafuaga tumatafaga. e ono tutupu foi nai saloga i talafatai o le atunuu. E iai foi taimi, e ono fafati ai galu i le muliava (gatu) o le uafu. Puipui/Tapenaga Faatino: Tagata uma o loo tafafaoi le matafaga, auau, fa`apea le `au fa`ase`e galu, e tatau ona fa`autagiaina fautuaga uma e aumaiae tagata o loo puipuia le saogalemu ma ia faatinoina ma le faaeteete.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
